name: Mind Knives
description:
Small arcade game of precision and skill

Controls

How to play

Throw the knife and control it

Collect coins to get more knives

Destroy the evil of the world

Mind of Knives is a game made in a month in PICO 8 by Ivan Aco in the code and design and Geovanny Gavilanes in the beautiful art. Music by Gruber.

Thanks for playing, that means a lot for us!
